data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sehnal, Richard (2018): A new species of Brachylepis Kolbe, 1894 from Tanzania (Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae: Leucopholini). Zootaxa 4377 (2): 291-295, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4377.2.9|6 occurrences
